message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $16,000. I believe it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $16,000 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product.
